description:
Point data representing locations of CTA bus stops. See attachment below for information on STATUS and POS fields
To view or use these files, compression software and special GIS software, such as ESRI ArcGIS is required.                                                           
Projected Coordinate System:	NAD_1983_StatePlane_Illinois_East_FIPS_1201_Feet
